Hey all. I'm building a database of local card/comic/TCG shops around the country that I can use as sources for future PSA Magazine stories.

So, what are your favorite local card shops? Shoot me a reply/DM.

If you're an LCS owner and want to be added, same thing. Thanks!

cross-platform questions ... 

who's on IG? and, who are your favorite baseball card accounts on IG? send me whatever you got. or just give me a follow and i'll return the favor. thanks!
